body.p: Another use case is to specify a number of pages for a section. Suppose that you have a table of contents that follows the cover page and you need to have an even number of pages. Hence, the next chapter would start on an even page.
In your customization CSS, use the -oxy-force-page-count property with an even value:
Supported values for -oxy-force-page-count include: even, odd, end-on-even, end-on-odd, auto, no-force.
